mapper.select: SELECT B.*, M.email AS sellerEmail, S.account AS account FROM BUYLIST B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.sellerno = M.no JOIN SELLER S ON M.no = S.no WHERE B.status IN (5, 6) ORDER BY B.status ASC, B.decideDate DESC, B.buyno LIMIT #{startIdx}, 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUYLIST WHERE status = 5 OR status = 6
mapper.update: UPDATE BUYLIST SET status = '6' WHERE buyno = #{buyno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUYLIST WHERE status = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUYLIST WHERE status = 2;

SELECT DATE(decidedate) AS date, SUM(price) AS totalprice FROM BUYLIST WHERE status = 6 AND decidedate >= NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND decidedate <= NOW() GROUP BY DATE(decidedate) ORDER BY DATE(decidedate) ASC
SELECT SUM(price) as total_salses FROM BUYLIST WHERE status = 6
SELECT SUM(price) AS today_sales FROM BUYLIST WHERE status = 6 AND DATE(decidedate) = CURDATE();
SELECT m.nickname AS MVP_nickname, SUM(b.price) AS MVP_total FROM BUYLIST b JOIN MEMBER m ON b.sellerno = m.no WHERE b.status = 6 GROUP BY m.nickname ORDER BY MVP_total DESC LIMIT 1
